sense.name: technology
sense.commentary: the practical application of science to commerce or industry
sense.examples: Fast home computers are an example of great engineering.

sense.name: applied science
sense.commentary: engineering science, technology - the discipline dealing with the art or science of applying scientific knowledge to practical problems
sense.examples: He had trouble deciding which branch of engineering to study.

sense.name: engine room
sense.commentary: a room (as on a ship) in which the engine is located
sense.examples: Engineering is located in the bottom in the ship. The captain is down in engineering, right now.
